reviewText: The HORROR 10 MOVIE PACK is a nicely mixed bag of cult classics, a made-for-TV film, a couple of European fright flicks and mostly obscure American made chill-cinema. The price is quite reasonable, and these strange tales will make a good addition to any horror film fan's collection. For some pleasant nightmares, check out DEADTIME STORIES 10 Movie Pack. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (3.2) Atom Age Vampire (Italy-1960) - Alberto Lupo (2.3) The Atomic Brain ("Monstrosity") (1964) - Marjorie Eaton/Frank Gerstle (2.2) Bloodlust! (1961) - Wilton Graff/Robert Reed/June Kenney (3.3) The Brain Machine (1977) - James Best/Gerald McRaney (3.2) The Brain That Wouldn't Die (1962) - Jason Evers/Virginia Leith (3.6) Good Against Evil (TV-1977) - Dack Rambo/Dan O'Herlihy/Kim Cattrall (minor role) (6.2) The Little Shop Of Horrors (1960) - Jonathan Haze/Jackie Joseph/Jack Nicholson (bit part) (5.3) Nightmare Castle (Italy-1965) - Barbara Steele/Laurence Clift (in support) (2.9) The Screaming Skull (1958) - John Hudson/Peggy Webber (6.5) White Zombie (1932) - Bela Lugosi/Madge Bellamy

this one really left me cold. i own a lot of these 10and 20 pack movies and like them. so i don't expect great prints,but i do think that you should be able to watch them and these are not watchable. you can get these movies in other collections and i would pass this one up.
